alert.note: Alert for Central Chelan County; Western Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 9:17PM PST until January 19 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches. * WHERE...Plain, Stehekin, Holden Village, Leavenworth, and Stevens Pass. * WHEN...Until 3 PM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest travel information in Washington, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel

area.areaDesc: Central Chelan County; Western Chelan County
